cell.text:
<script language="JavaScript">
function populateSchedule() {
    var term = $( "select[id|='scheduleTerm']" ).val();
    updateDynamicForm("goal-course-populate", term);
}
$(function() {
    updateDynamicForm("updateTemplate"); 
}); </script>
